modName: Nadine Temptress Race Marksman Trainer and Follower
summary: Adds a Temptress Race Follower to your world of Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=8][color=Green][u][i]Nadine
Temptress Race Follower[/center][/size][/color][/u][/i]


[b][size=2][color=yellow][u]Features:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
One Handed + Archery Combat Style
She will Auto-Level with the player up to lvl 50
She is not essential
She is marriable
Marksman Master Trainer
She got a elven weapon set (1H Sword, Bow+100 Arrows and Dagger)
She also carrys a random amount of gold with her

[u][b]She got following perks:[/u][/b]
Armsman
Bladesman
Light Foot
Overdraw
Hunters Discipline
Eagle Eye
She is born as a Temptress
You will find her in Silverblood Inn/Markath

[b][size=2][color=yellow][u]Required Mods:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22816]Fallout Hair Pack[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717]Temptress Race[/url]

[b][size=2][color=yellow][u]Recommended Mods:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21123]The Wilds ENB[/url] + [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22351]this Booster[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP Body[/url]

[b][color=yellow] [u]Changelog: [/color][/u] [/b]
1.0 Initial release

[b][color=yellow] [u] INSTALLATION (NMM): [/color][/u] [/b]     <------RECOMMENDED OPTION
1. Download the mod with the NexusModManager
2. Activate it with it and overwrite if asked ( but normally you dont have to)
3. Check if the ESP/ESM file is checked in your Plugins-List (I\'m sure the most of you know)
4. Enjoy your new follower!

[b][color=yellow] [u] INSTALLATION (MANUALLY): [/color][/u] [/b] 
1. Download the mod manually to your PC
2. Extract the archive with any Compression tool (eg. Winrar, 7Zip..)
3. Drop the files in the DATA folder of your Skyrim directory and overwrite if asked
4. Activate the ESP/ESM file in your Skyrim Launcher
5. Enjoy your new follower!

[b][color=yellow] [u] Known Bugs: [/color][/u] [/b] 
If you get a darker head then the rest of the body (neckseam)
open the console and type setnpcweight 60

If you have any requests or suggestions, they are welcome :)

[b] Please [color=red] COMMENT [/color] and [color=red] ENDORSE! [/color][/b]

[color=yellow][b][u]My other mods:[/color][/b][/u][size=0.5](Click the images)[/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23900]Celes Lunari Race Follower[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23639]Jasmin Lunari Race 1H Trainer Follower[/url]
